QuestData.Title: Efficient Excavations
QuestData.Description: This manual describes outlandish theories on how to efficiently manage large groups of workers as they engage in the manual labor of various types of excavation.$b$bIt becomes clear to you that the author of the book is the figure in charge of the over-aggressive pillagers here.$b$bPerhaps an introduction is in order.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: You can only assume that this picture is of the self-absorbed author.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 'Efficient Excavations' to Belloc Brightblade in Schnottz's Landing.
